name.ui:title: Name
name.ui:help: The name of the generated service and deployment

domain.ui:title: Domain
domain.ui:help: The target namespace for the generated service and deployment

targetPort.ui:title: Target port
targetPort.ui:help: The container image to deploy, for example nginx-ingress:latest

service.ui:title: Service
service.ui:help: The port to expose the Service on
